data.lyric:
[ti:White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:The Definitive Collection]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]White Christmas - Bing Crosby (平克·劳斯)
[00:11.42]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[00:21.40]Just like the ones I used to know.
[00:29.64]Where the treetops glisten,
[00:35.63]And children listen
[00:40.31]To hear sleigh bells in the snow.
[00:50.17]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[01:01.15]With every Christmas card I write.
[01:08.89]May your days be merry and bright.
[01:18.93]And may all your Christmases be white.
[01:30.41]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[01:40.65]Just like the ones I used to know.
[01:48.70]Where the treetops glisten,
[01:54.25]And children listen
[02:01.24]To hear sleigh bells in the snow.
[02:10.54]
[02:11.85]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[02:19.77]With every Christmas card I write.
[02:27.70]May your days be merry and bright.
[02:38.12]And may all your Christmases be white.
data.trans:
[ti:White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:The Definitive Collection]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.42]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[00:21.40]就像我曾熟悉的那样
[00:29.64]树梢上的灯闪烁着
[00:35.63]孩子们聆听着
[00:40.31]奔跑在雪地上的雪橇的铃铛声
[00:50.17]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[01:01.15]我会亲手写下每一封圣诞卡片
[01:08.89]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[01:18.93]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
[01:30.41]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[01:40.65]就像我曾熟悉的那样
[01:48.70]树梢上的灯闪烁着
[01:54.25]孩子们聆听着
[02:01.24]奔跑在雪地上的雪橇的铃铛声
[02:10.54]
[02:11.85]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[02:19.77]我会亲手写下每一封圣诞卡片
[02:27.70]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[02:38.12]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
[02:51.28]
